org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.config

Class ConfigBoolean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.config.BaseConfigVariable
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.config.ConfigVariable
        • org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.config.ConfigBoolean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptionSource

    public final class ConfigBoolean
extends ConfigVariable
    Extends ConfigVariable to support setting boolean configuration options. Values of "true", "yes", and "on" are supported.
